features.title: Powerful Tools for Education
features.scheduling_desc: Optimize your lesson schedule, prevent conflicts, and use your time efficiently.
features.students_desc: Create custom progress reports, notes, and homework tracking for each student.
features.progress_desc: Review success charts, identify gaps, and focus on goals.
features.communication_desc: Stay connected with students and parents through integrated messaging and announcements.
features.payments_desc: Track tuition plans, automate reminders, and keep every receipt synced.
features.guardians_desc: Share progress snapshots with families and centralize parent communication.
features.resources_desc: Store and share educational materials, documents, and videos securely.
features.mobile_desc: Access your dashboard from anywhere with our responsive mobile interface.
features.subtitle: Plan lessons, track students and understand performance in one clean, modern workspace.

how_it_works.title: How Deniko Works?
how_it_works.subtitle: Simplify complex processes. Complete your digital transformation in just 3 steps.
how_it_works.step1_desc: Create your digital identity by selecting your instructor or student role.
how_it_works.step2_desc: Set lesson hours, availability, and work calendar.
how_it_works.step3_desc: Focus on the education process with automatic reminders and analytics.

cta.subtitle: Leave traditional methods behind. Make your education process more organized and efficient with Deniko.

hero.title: How can we help?
hero.subtitle: Search our knowledge base or contact our support team.

general.question: What is Deniko?
general.answer: Deniko is a comprehensive platform for private tutoring management. It helps teachers organize their schedule, track students, and manage payments efficiently.

general.question: Is it free?
general.answer: Yes, Deniko is completely free to use. There are no hidden fees or subscriptions.

general.question: How secure is my data?
general.answer: We use industry-standard encryption to protect your data. All connections are secured with SSL/TLS, and we perform regular backups.

general.question: Can I use Deniko on mobile?
general.answer: Yes, Deniko is fully responsive and works great on all mobile devices, tablets, and desktops without needing a separate app.

general.question: Who can use Deniko?
general.answer: Deniko is designed for private tutors, education coaches, study centers, and students taking private lessons.

general.question: Is an internet connection required?
general.answer: Yes, Deniko is a cloud-based platform, so you need an internet connection to access your data and receive updates.

general.question: Can I use it on multiple devices?
general.answer: Absolutely! You can access your account from your computer, tablet, or phone simultaneously. All your data is synced instantly.

billing.question: How do I track student payments?
billing.answer: You can record payments received from students, view pending payments, and create reminders through the finance module.

teachers.question: How do I add students?
teachers.answer: Go to the Students tab in your dashboard and click the 'Add Student' button. You can then enter their details or send them an invite link.

teachers.question: Can I track student attendance?
teachers.answer: Yes, you can mark attendance for each lesson directly from your calendar or lesson details page.

teachers.question: How do I share files with students?
teachers.answer: You can upload and share documents, homework, and resources within each lesson or directly on a student's profile.

teachers.question: Is there a limit on the number of students?
teachers.answer: No, there is no limit on the number of students you can add.

teachers.question: How do I create my schedule?
teachers.answer: You can easily set your lesson hours, recurring lessons, and availability using the calendar module.

teachers.question: Can I communicate with parents?
teachers.answer: Yes, you can add parent information to student profiles and send information messages or reports to parents through the system.

teachers.question: How is homework tracking done?
teachers.answer: You can assign homework to students, set due dates, and track completion status.

students.question: How do I join a class?
students.answer: Use the invite link provided by your teacher to create an account and automatically join their class.

students.question: How do I see my upcoming lessons?
students.answer: Your dashboard shows a personalized calendar with all your upcoming lessons, assignments, and deadlines.

students.question: Can I message my teacher?
students.answer: Yes, you can use the built-in messaging system to communicate with your teacher securely regarding lessons or assignments.

students.question: How do I submit homework?
students.answer: Navigate to the specific lesson or assignment in your dashboard and use the upload button to submit your work.

students.question: How do I access lesson notes?
students.answer: You can access lesson notes shared by your teacher from the relevant lesson's detail page or the resource library.

students.question: How do I change my notification settings?
students.answer: You can customize your email and in-app notification preferences from the settings menu.

cta.title: Still need help?
cta.subtitle: Our support team is just a click away.
